Text:
Thx!

Note that the order is wrong, where as the dates encoded in the filenames are right. Thus "Bop Gun" is the first episode.

See http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0106028/episodes#season-2
Actually the episodes are in production order.  Not sure if that's better than the showing order, but I believe that that is the way they're ordered on the DVD.

Awesome upload
Does anyone have Season 3??
